description: This is a CSS file that defines styles for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application, including variables for colors, layouts for game elements, and responsive design rules.

classes.name: game
classes.description: Styles for the game container, defining flexbox layout and background color.

classes.name: game-title
classes.description: Styling for the game title, adjusting font size and color.

classes.name: game-status
classes.description: Styling for indicating the current status of the game.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Grid layout for the game board containing the squares.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styling for individual squares on the game board.

classes.name: reset-button
classes.description: Styles for the reset button, including background color and hover effects.
